title: New leak points to a compact Sony Xperia phone available worldwide
description: Details have emerged of a new Xperia phone with a 5.5-inch display and a mid-range set of internal specs.

title: The Google Pixel 7a just showed up on Amazon
description: Amazon is letting users sign up for Pixel 7a updates, which suggests that another affordable handset is on the way.

title: AMD’s RDNA 3 mobile flagship could be incredibly fast – and matched by Nvidia RTX 4090 laptop GPU?
description: It’s too early to get excited about the future of laptop gaming, but these leaks make it difficult not to do so.
